garment_condition: Garment L* darker than neutral (delta_L = 50 - garment.L_star positive)
effect: Perceived width reduction via irradiation illusion
source_text: delta_L = 50 - garment.L_star; slim = clamp(delta_L * 0.0024, -0.12, +0.12); tall = clamp(delta_L * 0.0004, -0.02, +0.02)

effect: Sheen penalty: highlights on convexities reduce slim benefit
score_formula: slim *= max(0.20, 1.0 - sheen * 0.80)
source_text: Gate 1: Sheen penalty. if fabric.sheen > 0.30: slim *= max(0.20, 1.0 - sheen * 0.80)

effect: Low skin contrast reduces slim effect
score_formula: slim *= (delta / 15.0) where delta = |body.skin_L - garment.L_star|
source_text: Gate 2: Skin contrast. if |body.skin_L - garment.L_star| < 15: slim *= (delta / 15.0)

effect: Dark recession subtracts height on petite
score_formula: tall -= 0.04
source_text: Gate 3: Petite recession. if body.H < 63 and garment.L_star < 15: tall -= 0.04

effect: Apple amplification of dark slimming
score_formula: slim *= 1.30
source_text: Gate 4: Apple amplification. if body.WHR > 0.85: slim *= 1.30

effect: Rigid fabric reduces slim effect
score_formula: slim *= max(0.30, drape)
source_text: Gate 5: Rigid fabric. if fabric.drape < 0.40: slim *= max(0.30, drape)

effect: Full Helmholtz slimming
source_text: STAGE 1: if body.WHR < 0.78: slim = +0.06; tall = +0.03 # Full Helmholtz

effect: Linear decay of Helmholtz slimming
score_formula: slim = lerp(+0.06, 0.00) based on WHR position in range
source_text: elif body.WHR < 0.85: slim = lerp(+0.06, 0.00) # Linear decay

effect: Transition zone - stripes becoming harmful
source_text: elif body.WHR < 0.92: slim = lerp(0.00, -0.03) # Transition

effect: ASHIDA REVERSAL - stripes become measurement lines, actively harmful
score_formula: slim = -0.06; tall = -0.02; OVERRIDE: recommend solid dark or diagonal
source_text: else: # WHR >= 0.92. slim = -0.06; tall = -0.02 # ASHIDA REVERSAL. OVERRIDE: recommend solid dark or diagonal

garment_condition: Stripe width ratio > 12% of torso width
effect: Wide stripes collapse slim effect
score_formula: stripe_ratio = garment.stripe_width / (body.B_c / pi); if stripe_ratio > 0.12: slim *= 0.3; slim = min(slim, -0.01)
source_text: STAGE 2: Stripe frequency (Oppel-Kundt). stripe_ratio = garment.stripe_width / (body.B_c / pi). if stripe_ratio > 0.12: slim *= 0.3; slim = min(slim, -0.01)

effect: Stripes curve over convexities = shape revelation
score_formula: slim = min(slim, -0.03)
source_text: STAGE 3: Fabric corrections. if fabric.stretch > 0.15 and silhouette == FITTED: slim = min(slim, -0.03)

effect: Motion reduces stripe effect
score_formula: slim *= 0.50
source_text: STAGE 4: Context. if context == VIDEO: slim *= 0.50

effect: In-person viewing drastically reduces stripe effect
score_formula: slim *= 0.30
source_text: if context == IN_PERSON: slim *= 0.30

effect: Petite amplification of stripe tall effect
score_formula: tall *= 1.30
source_text: if body.H < 63: tall *= 1.30 # Petite amplification

effect: Maximum tall benefit for petite with sufficient torso
source_text: P4 High Rise: MAX BENEFIT. Tall x1.40 (+0.21). Each inch of rise is larger % of total height. CHECK TLR: if < 0.52 (short torso): OVERRIDE -> tall = 0.00

effect: Short torso override - tall benefit nullified entirely
score_formula: tall = 0.00 (OVERRIDE)
source_text: CHECK TLR: if < 0.52 (short torso): OVERRIDE -> tall = 0.00

effect: Positive if garment fits above belly
score_formula: slim = +0.04 (FIT-DEPENDENT)
source_text: P4 High Rise for Apple: COMPLEX. +0.04 or -0.06 (FIT-DEPENDENT). If on belly: muffin top. If above belly: good.

effect: Muffin top - actively harmful
score_formula: slim = -0.06
source_text: If on belly: muffin top. FIT_QUALITY gate critical. High rise ONLY if fit confirmed. Mid rise (9-10 inches) as safe default.

effect: Enhanced tall benefit for pear - covers hip-waist transition at narrowest point
source_text: P4 High Rise for Pear: ENHANCED. +0.18 net. Covers hip-waist transition at narrowest point. BUT: if pant tight at hip, stress lines reveal hip width.

effect: Enhanced elongation - V proportionally larger opening on smaller frame
score_formula: tall *= 1.20
source_text: P5 V-Neck for Petite: ENHANCED. Tall x1.20. V proportionally larger opening on smaller frame. Critical if short neck.

effect: Enhanced slim via vertical corridor through midsection
score_formula: slim += 0.01 bonus. Moderate V (3-5 inches). NOT deep V on large bust.
source_text: P5 V-Neck for Apple: Enhanced. Slim +0.01 bonus. Vertical corridor through midsection. Moderate V (3-5 inches). NOT deep V on large bust.

effect: Enhanced elongation + attention shift away from hips
score_formula: +0.09 elongation + 0.03 attention shift
source_text: P5 V-Neck for Pear: ENHANCED. +0.09 + attention +0.03. Draws eye upward away from hips. Moderate to deep V (4-6 inches). Wider angle adds shoulder width.

effect: MAX BENEFIT - single most valuable technique for petite
score_formula: tall *= 1.40 (net +0.124). Each color break is larger % of height on petite.
source_text: P6 Monochrome for Petite: MAX BENEFIT. Tall x1.40 (+0.124 net). Each color break is larger % of height on petite. SINGLE MOST VALUABLE TECHNIQUE for petite.

effect: Strongly enhanced - continuous column through midsection
score_formula: slim *= 1.20 (net +0.108). Any horizontal break AT midsection = catastrophic.
source_text: P6 Monochrome for Apple: STRONGLY ENHANCED. Slim x1.20 (+0.108). Continuous column THROUGH midsection. Any horizontal break AT midsection = catastrophic. NO belt or tone-on-tone narrow only.

effect: Critically important - monochrome strictly dominates color-blocked under 5'7"
score_formula: +0.15 swing vs. color-blocked. Standard 'dark bottom, light top' creates horizontal break.
source_text: P6 Monochrome for Pear: CRITICALLY IMPORTANT. +0.15 swing vs. color-blocked. PEAR CRITICAL: monochrome STRICTLY DOMINATES color-blocked under 5'7". One of biggest single-variable improvements in system.

effect: CONDITIONAL - volume shortens petite disproportionately
score_formula: Max angle 20 degrees. Circle skirt PROHIBITED. Structured fabric only.
source_text: P7 A-Line for Petite: CONDITIONAL. Max angle 20 degrees. Volume shortens petite disproportionately. Circle skirt PROHIBITED. Structured fabric only.

effect: Reduced benefit - only helpful if flare starts below midsection
score_formula: slim = +0.04. Only helpful if flare starts BELOW midsection. Empire A-line WORSE (tent).
source_text: P7 A-Line for Apple: REDUCED. Slim +0.04. Doesn't address midsection. Only helpful if flare starts BELOW midsection. Empire A-line WORSE (tent).

effect: Strongly enhanced - optimal silhouette for pear
score_formula: slim = +0.10 hip concealment. Flare from waist conceals hip differential.
source_text: P7 A-Line for Pear: STRONGLY ENHANCED. Slim +0.10 hip concealment. Flare from waist conceals hip differential. A-line is OPTIMAL silhouette for pear.

effect: PROHIBITED - belt proportionally wider on petite frame
score_formula: Width > 1.5 inches: PROHIBITED. Tone-on-tone narrow ONLY. Wide contrasting belt = worst single item.
source_text: P8 Belt for Petite: RISKY. Width > 1.5 inches: PROHIBITED. Belt proportionally wider on petite frame. Tone-on-tone narrow ONLY. Wide contrasting belt = worst single item.

effect: DANGEROUS - belt at waist = belt at widest area
score_formula: +0.02 to -0.04. Contrasting/wide: NEGATIVE. Beltless safer default.
source_text: P8 Belt for Apple: DANGEROUS. +0.02 to -0.04. Belt at waist = belt at WIDEST AREA. Contrasting/wide: NEGATIVE. Beltless safer default.

effect: Enhanced - belt at narrowest point is positive
score_formula: +0.08 waist definition. POSITION CRITICAL: must be at waist, NOT at hip.
source_text: P8 Belt for Pear: Enhanced. +0.08 waist definition. At narrowest point = positive. POSITION CRITICAL: must be at waist, NOT at hip.

effect: MAX BENEFIT - dark panels contract midsection area
score_formula: slim *= 1.40 (+0.14). Side panels + lighter center = waist illusion. OPTIMAL technique.
source_text: P9 Side Panels for Apple: MAX BENEFIT. Slim x1.40 (+0.14). Dark flanks contract midsection area. Side panels + lighter center = waist illusion. OPTIMAL technique.

effect: MAX BENEFIT for hip contraction
score_formula: slim *= 1.20 (+0.12). Dark panels contract hip region. Exact area pear wants minimized.
source_text: P9 Side Panels for Pear: MAX BENEFIT. Slim x1.20 (+0.12). Dark panels contract hip region. Exact area pear wants minimized.

effect: Standard enhanced effect
score_formula: Standard (+0.10). Proportional. Works normally.
source_text: P9 Side Panels for Petite: Enhanced. Standard (+0.10). Proportional. Works normally.

effect: MAX NEGATIVE - maps midsection as widest feature
score_formula: slim = -0.08. COMPRESSION_VIOLATION override. Structured column (+0.12) strictly dominates.
source_text: P10 Bodycon for Apple: MAX NEGATIVE. Slim = -0.08. Maps midsection as widest feature. COMPRESSION_VIOLATION override. Structured column (+0.12) strictly dominates.

effect: NEGATIVE - maps every hip contour
score_formula: slim = -0.05. Structured column strictly dominates.
source_text: P10 Bodycon for Pear: NEGATIVE. Slim -0.05. Maps every hip contour. Structured column strictly dominates.

body_condition: Hourglass (|B_c - H_c| <= 1 inch AND waist_differential >= 9 inches)
effect: OPTIMAL - hourglass can showcase body proportions
score_formula: +0.04. Bodycon OPTIMAL for hourglass.
source_text: Hourglass: Bodycon OPTIMAL (+0.04).

effect: NEGATIVE - amplified negative; closes limited vertical column
score_formula: tall *= 1.30 (amplified negative). One of worst necklines for petite. V-neck strictly dominates.
source_text: P11 Turtleneck for Petite: NEGATIVE. Tall x1.30 (amplified negative). Closes limited vertical column. One of worst necklines for petite. V-neck strictly dominates.

effect: Negative - unbroken surface from neck to bust creates dome effect
score_formula: slim = -0.04. V-neck creates moderating shadow. Strictly dominant.
source_text: P11 Turtleneck for Apple: Negative. Slim -0.04. Unbroken surface from neck to bust = dome effect. V-neck creates moderating shadow. Strictly dominant.

effect: Negative - closes neckline, minor effect
score_formula: -0.02 to -0.03. V-neck strictly dominates for attention-shift benefit.
source_text: P11 Turtleneck for Pear: Negative. -0.02/-0.03. Closes neckline (minor). V-neck strictly dominates for attention-shift benefit.

effect: Zone-specific: positive on torso
score_formula: Torso: +0.04. H-striped TOP + solid dark BOTTOM. Never H-stripes on lower body.
source_text: P2 H-Stripes for Pear: ZONE-SPECIFIC. Torso: +0.04. Hips: -0.02. H-striped TOP + solid dark BOTTOM. Never H-stripes on lower body.

effect: Zone-specific: negative on hips - approaching Ashida zone
score_formula: Hips: -0.02. Hip-region stripes approach Ashida zone.
source_text: P2 H-Stripes for Pear: Hips: -0.02. Hip-region stripes approach Ashida zone.

effect: NEGATIVE - widening at widest point
score_formula: slim *= 1.50 at hips. V-stripes on upper body only (adds shoulder width = good for balance).
source_text: P3 V-Stripes for Pear: NEGATIVE on lower. Slim x1.50 at hips. Widening at widest point. V-stripes on upper body only (adds shoulder width = good for balance).

effect: Diminished - widening at midsection
score_formula: slim = -0.03. Solid dark strictly dominates.
source_text: P3 V-Stripes for Apple: Diminished. Slim -0.03. Widening at midsection. Solid dark strictly dominates.

effect: Enhanced tall - elongation proportionally larger % of total height
score_formula: tall *= 1.30. YES for tall-priority. NO for slim-priority.
source_text: P3 V-Stripes for Petite: ENHANCED tall. Tall x1.30. Elongation proportionally larger % of total height. YES for tall-priority. NO for slim-priority.

effect: Diminished slim + negative tall due to dark recession
score_formula: Slim +0.10, Tall -0.04. Cap at L* 15. Suggest navy/charcoal (L* 18-25) over pure black.
source_text: P1 Dark for Petite: DIMINISHED. Slim +0.10, Tall -0.04. Dark recession subtracts height. Cap at L* 15. Suggest navy/charcoal (L* 18-25) over pure black.

effect: STRONGLY ENHANCED - highest-impact single variable for apple
score_formula: Slim x1.30 (+0.16). HIGHEST-IMPACT single variable in entire system for apple. Matte NON-NEGOTIABLE.
source_text: P1 Dark for Apple: STRONGLY ENHANCED. Slim x1.30 (+0.16). HIGHEST-IMPACT single variable in entire system for apple. Matte NON-NEGOTIABLE.

effect: Enhanced - contracts lower body
score_formula: Standard. Contracts lower body. Dark monochrome preferred over color-blocked.
source_text: P1 Dark for Pear: Enhanced. Standard. Contracts lower body. Dark monochrome preferred over color-blocked.

effect: REVERSAL - stripes become measurement lines on apple
score_formula: slim = -0.06. HIGHEST-RISK body type. NEVER H-stripes for WHR > 0.92.
source_text: P2 H-Stripes for Apple: REVERSAL. WHR >0.92: slim = -0.06. Ashida zone: stripes become measurement lines. HIGHEST-RISK body type. NEVER H-stripes for WHR > 0.92.

effect: OPTIMAL - showcases waist
score_formula: +0.08 showcases waist. Belt OPTIMAL for hourglass.
source_text: Hourglass: Belt OPTIMAL (+0.08 showcases waist).

body_condition: Rectangle (|B_c - W_c| < 9 inches AND |H_c - W_c| < 10 inches)
effect: Optimal technique for rectangle - creates waist
score_formula: +0.18 combined (dark side panels + shape bonus).
source_text: Rectangle: Dark side panels = optimal technique (+0.18 combined). Belt on structured garment (+0.10). A-line adds shape.

effect: Positive for waist creation on rectangle
source_text: Rectangle: Belt on structured garment (+0.10).

body_condition: Inverted Triangle (B_c - H_c > 3.6 inches AND S_w > H_c x 0.38)
effect: Optimal for balance - adds hip width
score_formula: +0.14 with balance. A-line bottom = optimal for inverted triangle.
source_text: Inverted Triangle: A-line bottom = optimal (+0.14). Dark shoulder contraction. Color/pattern on lower body.

body_condition: Plus Size (W_c > 37 inches OR WHR > 0.85 at larger scale)
effect: Highest single-impact recommendation for plus size
score_formula: +0.20 swing from typical multi-break outfit. Side panels strongly positive (+0.12). Never satin/sheen dark.
source_text: Plus Size: Dark matte monochrome = highest single-impact recommendation (+0.20 swing from typical multi-break outfit). Side panels strongly positive (+0.12). Never satin/sheen dark (highlights on curves).

effect: ENHANCED - stripe spatial frequency higher on smaller body
score_formula: tall *= 1.30. Only if WHR < 0.85. Narrow stripes (<5% torso width) required.
source_text: P2 H-Stripes for Petite: ENHANCED. Tall x1.30. Stripe spatial frequency higher on smaller body. Only if WHR < 0.85. Narrow stripes (<5% torso width) required.

effect: Positive - Helmholtz slims
score_formula: slim = +0.06
source_text: H-Stripes: OPTIMAL For Hourglass (slim +0.06)

effect: Acceptable - narrows shoulder frame
score_formula: slim = +0.02
source_text: Inverted Triangle: Turtleneck acceptable (narrows shoulder frame).
